title: Microsoft Outlook Weather Location Preferences
description: Preferences for Microsoft Outlook Weather Location Functionality

HideFoldersOnMyComputerRootInFolderList.title: Hide local folders
HideFoldersOnMyComputerRootInFolderList.description: (HideFoldersOnMyComputerRootInFolderList)-Prevent users from viewing local On My Computer folders in the sidebar

AutomaticallyDownloadExternalContent.title: Specify when pictures are downloaded for email
AutomaticallyDownloadExternalContent.description: (AutomaticallyDownloadExternalContent)-Set when pictures are automatically downloaded from the internet for email. Found under Outlook > Preferences > Email > Reading > Security

DisableSignatures.title: Disable Signatures
DisableSignatures.description: (DisableSignatures)-Prevent users from being able to create, edit, and add client-side signatures

CalendarFirstDayOfWeek.title: Specify First Day of Calendar Week
CalendarFirstDayOfWeek.description: (CalendarFirstDayOfWeek)-Set the first day of week in calendar view

EnableNewOutlook.title: Enable New Outlook
EnableNewOutlook.description: (EnableNewOutlook)-Set the availability and default position of the New Outlook switch

enum_titles: Switch hidden and New Look Disabled (default)
New Outlook enabled with switch hidden

DisableEncryptOnly.title: Disable Encrypt-Only
DisableEncryptOnly.description: (DisableEncryptOnly)-Prevent users from applying the Encrypt-Only option to emails when using Microsoft 365 Message Encryption

DisableDoNotForward.title: Disable 'Do Not Forward'
DisableDoNotForward.description: (DisableDoNotForward)-Prevent users from applying the Do Not Forward option to emails when using Microsoft 365 Message Encryption
